system.requirements: Assassin, Arbitrator, Guardsman, or Scum Career, DH Rank 5+. No longer in overt Imperial Service, and have gained a charter from the Blood Guild of Malfi
system.descriptionText: Infamous trackers and bounty hunters. These individuals are issued Bloodsworn Charters, tough parchment bearing an authorising seal and a genelock circuit that identifies a victim by having their blood spilt upon it. Most often post mortem.
system.effects:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Malfian Bloodsworn
Gain a Bloodsworn Charter.

description.value:
